scripts.build: npm run private:swagger:prod && npm run private:build && mkdir -p ../../dist/backend/config && mkdir -p ../../dist/backend/public && mkdir -p ../../dist/backend/app && cp ../../out-tsc/backend/main.min.mjs ../../dist/backend/app
scripts.check: npm run private:swagger:prod && tsc -p tsconfig.check.json && tsc -p test/integration/tsconfig.check.json && npx eslint
scripts.private:serve: npm run private:swagger:dev && npm run private:build && cd ../../out-tsc && mkdir -p backend-serve/app && cp backend/main.min.mjs backend-serve/app && mkdir -p backend-serve/config && cp -n ../ts/backend/src/config/config.jsonc "$_" && rm -rf backend-serve/public && cp -rf ../ts/backend/src/public.${CUSTOMIZATION} backend-serve/public && cd backend-serve/app && node main.min.mjs --help --log-level=ALL --log-colorful --log-stringify
scripts.private:swagger:dev: swagger-jsdoc -d swagger.config.cjs -o src/swagger/swagger.json src/app/**/*.mts src/swagger/components.development.yml 2> swaggererrors.txt && cat swaggererrors.txt && exit $(cat swaggererrors.txt | wc -l)
scripts.private:swagger:prod: swagger-jsdoc -d swagger.config.cjs -o src/swagger/swagger.json src/app/**/*.mts src/swagger/components.yml 2> swaggererrors.txt && cat swaggererrors.txt && exit $(cat swaggererrors.txt | wc -l)
